title: Tahm Kench Bug
body: Nothing major, but something I found about 2 weeks ago. So in champion select when you hover over tahm kech you cannot see his ult description. Dont know if this is just me for some reason or what? Sorry if it has already been posted... :)

replies.body:
Heya **NeonPig**,

While we do appreciate you taking your time to report a bug here in the Help and Support boards, you'll likely want to report bugs in the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) boards to gain more visibility from the relevant Riot staff!
